column4: Guys, is anybody with hp pavilion g4 machine, ub 12.04 is not supported
i'm missing totally, its not at all booting
The same cd is booting in my old p4 machine

please be more verbose. is the boot menu of the cd showing, is the install running but sys does not boot later, is the install starting to boot but then hanging, can you enter boot options at any time?
i5 does not need support, its x86 so supported via this
not even the boot screen i see
if you dont see anything, then your laptop is broken.
well i can able to boot OSX and windows in the same laptop
i have no idea about this..
then it is booting. what **exactly** happens when you insert the install-cd?
it shows me a screen with menus, then i select first option.. to install in my machine
so the bootloader shows, good. try to add these boot options: noapic nolapic acpi=off acpi=no   (sort of redundant, as i dont know the exact ones)
and remove anything that says "quiet" or "splash"
and add "nospash" just in case (sorry for multiline response)
okay.. thanks let me try and get back
